tool.name: Metagenome Contributions

param.name: input_data
param.label: Input file
param.help: Biom file, which should be the output of the normalize_by_copy_number command.

param.name: limit_gene
param.label: Function ids
param.help: Limit to specified function ids (e.g. K00500). If limiting to multiple ids then separate them by commas with no spaces between them.

tool.help:
@PICRUST_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
This module outputs the relative contribution of OTUs to the predicted abundances of functions in your samples. The input biom file should be the output of normalize_by_copy_number. One output text file will be generated.
Make sure that you specify an appropriate functional database for this command (usually the ko, cog, or rfam v13_5 database).
